item.title: Hyperspectral imagery startup Wyvern looks to raise US presence with $6M raise
item.description:
Canadian remote sensing startup Wyvern is expanding south of the border.  The Alberta-based company, which collects what it says is the highest-resolution hyperspectral imagery on the market, has raised $6 million to, among other things, expand into U.S. commercial and defense markets.  The new funding was led by Squadra Ventures, a firm squarely focused on […]

item.title: Amazon deal of the day: Slash $300 off the crazy fast M3 Pro MacBook Pro
item.description: The best Amazon deals on Oct. 17 include the M3 Pro MacBook Pro, Soundcore Liberty 4 NC, Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE, and SodaStream Terra.

item.title: Get the new M3 MacBook Pro for $300 off at Amazon — its lowest price ever
item.description: With the M3 chip, the latest Apple MacBook Pro is the fastest version yet. Now you can get the 14-inch model for its lowest price ever at Amazon — slash $300 off every model.

item.title: Snag a Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 for a new low price at Walmart
item.description: As of Oct. 17, get the Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 for just $260.72, which is its lowest price yet.

item.title: SpaceX, Elon Musk's other companies could be on the hook for massive EU X fines
item.description: The EU has warned X that it may fine the social media platform based on a percentage of the revenue from all of Elon Musk's companies.
